reviews.review: Excellent teamplay. Horror factor keeps me jumping when the Killer sneaks up on me. Interesting mix of third- and first-person perspective.

Un buen juego de superviviencia y de killer, con diferentes mapas, lo espectacular del juego es que la ser online, todas y cada una de las partidas son únicas, ya que cada personaje (superviviente o asesino) tiene su mamera distintiva de jugar y esto permite que se lleven acabo experiencias diferentes.
Buen juego, comunidad toxica :P

the game is fun by yourself and with friends but it has a balancing problem.  Survivors are in most situations more scary than the actually killer.
Good game, just need some friends to play along

When this game is working properly, it is a gem with friends. The most fun I think is playing with 5 friends, one of which plays the killer. The online multiplayer mode can be very toxic on both ends. Still can be fun from time to time if you don't take it too seriously. This game you are going to die a lot. It isn't a very scary game, but it can be with some of the mechanics. Overall, I'd wait for a good sale because this game may be cheap, but if you want to play all of the survivors and killers it's going to cost a lot more if you buy not during a sale.

Primero lo primero, ¿lo recomiendo?, sip.
Dead by Daylight es un juego con una idea original llevado a cabo muy bien. Primero, ¿de que se trata?, DbD es un juego donde hay un asesino u/o monstruo que quiere matar a los 4 supervivientes. Hay dos modalides de juego, primero el asesino que tiene que cazar a los supervivientes y colgarlos en unos ganchos para que el ente, que seria como un ``un dios de la muerte'' los chupe/los mate, y también tiene que impedir que los sobrevivientes arreglen los generadores que hay sobre el mapa, si se arreglan 5 generadores se activaran dos puertas, los cuales son los lugares por donde se escapan. El segundo modo de juego son los sobrevivientes que tienen que escapar por las puertas arreglando los generadores, y también tienen que ayudar a los sobrevivientes que hayan sido colgados.

Puntos buenos: Esta muy bien balanceado la jugabilidad, entre asesino y sobrevivientes. Es muy divertido especialmente con amigos. Hay una variedad de asesinos y sobrevivientes muy amplia, lo cual esta bueno.

Puntos malos: El Matchmaking es muy malo, te empareja con gente con mucho mayor nivel y no es divertido cuando te toca un asesino que pega todo y vos recién estas comenzando o un sobreviviente que te haga loop por media hora y vos estas comenzando a entender como funciona el asesino. 
Eso es todo gracias por leer, sin dudas lo recomiendo.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
First, do I recommend it ?, yep.
Dead by Daylight is a game with an original idea carried out very well. So what is it about ?, DbD is a game where there is a murderer or / or monster who wants to kill the 4 survivors. There are two game modes, first the murderer who has to hunt down the survivors and hang them on hooks so that the entity, which would be like a `` god of death '', sucks / kills them, and also has to prevent For the survivors to fix the generators on the map, if 5 generators are fixed, two doors will be activated, which are the places where they escape. The second game mode is the survivors who have to escape through the doors fixing the generators, and also have to help the survivors who have been hanged.

Good points: The gameplay is very well balanced, between killer and survivors. It's a lot of fun especially with friends. There is a very wide variety of killers and survivors, which is good.

Bad points: Matchmaking is very bad, it matches you with people with a much higher level and it is not fun when you have a murderer who hits everything and you are just starting or a survivor who loops you for half an hour and you are beginning to understand how the killer works.
That's it, thanks for reading, I definitely recommend it.

Gameplay is fun and engaging as both killer and survivor, but the balancing issues is what makes me hate this game more than love it. You have killers like Doctor who just stun-lock you out of every action imaginable to the point where you just want to blow your fucking head off and rage-quit the game. This game is dead on PC too, taking forever to find matches unless you have crossplay on. Not to mention the cross-play players are actually retarded.

Вот вы заходите в эту игру. Вроде много убийц, выживающих и кажется, что всё хорошо... Однако в этой игре присутствует фишка "баланса", когда у тебя наиграно 65 часов, а кидают тебя к игрокам с 1365 наигранных часов (причем именно такие цифры и присутствовали в момент написания отзыва). И ладно если бы система курировалась не по наигранным часам, так тебя блять кидают (имея 17 ранг) к 4 и 6 рангам! Ахуенно блять. Пойду играть в пятницу 13, хуле

fun with friends but sort of anxiety inducing especially alone 7.8/10

I mean it's one of the best assymetrical multiplayer horror games out there.  Literally if you're not sure about it just try it.  The only thing i dont like is how cross-progression isn't a thing.  I bought steam version because the game just runs better on PC but all of my progress is on xbox one.  I've played for about 2/3 years now and my xbox account is loaded with all the DLC's, high leveled characters/killers and many cosmetics.  Other than that though gameplay is solid. It's like a giant game of hide and seek but with objectives.

O jogo fica melhor se você tem DLCs dos personagens famosos, mas elas não são essenciais então não se preocupe com isso.

It's a fun game at times.  But the company BHVR is incapable of balancing anything correctly and constantly have buggy patches they never fix.  Maybe if it was handled by a more competent dev team it could get a better community behind it.  Playing alone is a slog but playing with friends breaks the game for the killer.

A great way to make friends as killer in this game is to run the perk "Hex: No One Escapes Death."

After I started using it, I got plenty of friend requests!

Originally I played on playstation, but I switched to PC for the Nea update. As a killer she is a little OP.

SO I started watching people Stream this game way back in the day. Looked fun and the concept was simple and easy enough. So i picked up a copy, played it a few times (on Xbox) and for the community toxic towards new players. I never looked back. Saw this on Steam on sale and said why not. Now I seem addicted to it. It's so fun! Tons of "tokins" in the bloodweb to buy to help you as a player out, but not give you full advantage. I love playing killer, and I see there are all sort of rules made up for a killer...do's and don'ts. I say Pfftt.....to those rules.....you are a killer, why play a certain way or style to make the survivors happy? So the PC community can be a little toxic if you play killer. But it makes it more the fun to troll and Kill them! Again, that's your job: Kill the by any means. Pick this up and give it a try, takes a little time to get use to, but it's hell of a blast along the way.
A lot of fun, especially with friends. Hilarious and scary at the same time
